text: @realDonaldTrump Seems like "YOU KNOW WHO" is running scared? This  Pandemic has landed at his doorstep. And with every Covid19 update he makes things worst without even knowing it. He appoints VP Pence as the Covid19 leader yet "YOU KNOW WHO" is the first to speak. He believes the FAKE POLLS.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
